One of the greatest games off all time.

Half-Life 2 - Eh 

If you keep up with my reviews it'll come as no surprise that I've never been the biggest fan of the Half-Life series. So when I played HL 2 I wasn't sure what to expect. A good game that fixes the problems I had with the previous, or a bad one that fixes none of the problems I had with the last one. well, here's how it went. 

The story of this game is lacklustre like Half Life 1 but is a huge improvement. This time the mysterious man in the suit has summoned you to be in the right place at the right time and do his bidding. The game is set in the same universe with some characters you may have heard mentioned in the first game all now living in this new district! The game throws you into the action as your taken out a train station by an undercover agent and told to escape and reach the doctors lab. Half Life 2 wastes no time throwing you straight into the action as you run across rooftops dodging gunfire from enemies and see the effect that the city’s harsh laws are having on its citizens. Upon reaching the doctors lab you get your welcomes and fast forward ahead lot's of dialogue your put in a teleporter only for a headcrab to jump in too and interfere with it all! This is where the story really begins. The head of the city sees you and guards are called out to your area and you must fight your way out to another lab! This is where the game begins to fall short in my opinion. It then becomes, hear some lines of dialogue, run through some scripted action scenes, and make it to your destination only to then rinse and repeat. The only thing that kept me going was the characters. Unlike Half-Life 1 there are a few main characters that make you feel like fighting through and seeing the game to the end. They have their own stories which include you and you helping them, and I really liked these stories and wanted to see the outcome and at about 3-5 hours in I was hooked! I was hanging onto every character encounter and excited to fight my way through waves of enemies to get to them and find out what on earth is going to happen next! It took time, but I liked the story, I thought it was a good one. 

The mechanics in this game, well they hold up well to put it simply. Guns feel good and accurate, enemies don't feel overpowered, accessing health and amour is easier than Half-Life 1 and everything in general feels smooth and great to control. on foot that is. I had problems with the driving controls, they felt very clunky and slippery to control which is a shame considering you spend a good chunk of the game driving. I encountered little to no glitches and things seemed to just work. Overall, the mechanics are great!

The graphics, while they look slightly outdated, they do hold up in some way or another. Some views are scenic and look great while other times small textures and details tend to become apparent from time to time, but when you look past that the game looks really, really nice for it's age and isn't visually displeasing to look at. 

Pros: Good story, controls really well on food, guns feel solid, voice acting is good, characters have great stories to them. 

Cons: Driving controls aren't great, may take you a while to get into the game.

To conclude, Half-Life 2 felt a bit like an 'eh' experience to me. I liked it yes but it didn't blow me away or make me sad that I finished it, it's just another on a long list I can tick off. When the game was engaging and fun to play it was a blast, but when it was boring and just shoot, shoot, shoot, I’d rather be doing anything else. Maybe Half-Life just isn't for me. But aside from all that, Half-Life 2 is a brilliant game and one that I'm sure many of you will enjoy playing! 

8/10 Neppy Review.
yes

Пожалуй лучшая игра в серии, по моему мнению! Когда в первой Вас долбали постоянными головоломками и плохой стрельбой, здесь Вам предоставляют топовую игру, даже на сегодняшний день. Тут и не плохая графика, сюжет 10/10 (очень схож с настоящей жизнью), стрельба зачёт, полно модов. Очень динамичная игра, не успевает надоесть... Оптимизация на уровне! Багов - нету, вообще. Вообщем - рекомендую. Вечная классика!

Первое оружие в игре которое достается тебе это ломик, который меня всю игру выручал не мало, с его помощью можно завалить пару хедкрабов или зазевавшегося врага. Арсенал небольшой, но вполне достаточный по мощности. Мне понравилось к примеру из арбалета кого нибудь пригвоздить к стене. А как я баловался когда мне попалась гравитационная пушка, во врагов от меня летело всё от различных ящиков и баллонов до гранат которые они в меня кидали, а еще попадаются острые диски-лезвия которыми можно было распилить зомби. Что еще меня впечатлило, это возможность натравить на врага огромных муравьев, используя феромоны их королевы.
В общем если не играли в эту игру, то обязательно поиграйте, я сомневаюсь что кому то она не понравится.

I've been waiting to get this game for one whole year and finally, in that winter sale of 2020, I finally purchased Black Mesa, Half-Life 2 and Episode 1. I wouldn't consider myself new to this franchise, even though I've only known about it since 2017 partially, but from everything I've read, watched, I knew this game was gonna be great. And surely it was. The graphics, even for a 2004 game, are amazing. The storyline is intriguing and makes you want to progress, the characters are realistic with their emotion and dialogue. All I can say is that it's great and I'm surprised with how cheap it is for a game like this. Excited for more!

Terminei de jogar em 2021. Portanto, se você está com receio por ser um jogo muito antigo, não fique. Aguarde a próxima promoção e compre!

Eu já havia jogado este jogo há muito tempo atrás, próximo do lançamento. Porém, como na época não havia legendas, não entendi muito da história. Lembro que fiquei impressionado com as possibilidades do jogo, poder pegar as coisas no chão, arremessar caixas com Gravity Gun. Até aquele momento havia sido o melhor jogo que havia jogado - justamente por isso fiz questão de compra-lo para joga-lo e entender a história.

Atualmente, o jogo continua muito bom, os gráficos envelheceram bem, o sistema de tiro, a gravidade do jogo, não parece com um jogo quatro anos mais novo que a troca de milênio.

Levando em consideração a época em que foi lançado, não tem como deixar de lista-lo como um dos melhores jogos já feito. É de aplaudir de pé

Just finished a let's play of this over on my Youtube channel, so here's a link for anyone wanting to see a gameplay sample: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KJ9KVI0IwEc&list=PL05Yc3_TEBpNWx_RfNrHGpQw-cMM-D50E

I've really enjoyed playing this game. It's a definite step up from the original Half Life, and despite being over 15 years old, the visuals, sound design and gameplay are as striking as I'm sure they were back when the game was first released in 2004.

To me, the gameplay felt nice and smooth; overall, a real pleasure to play. As a shooter, most of it is action-oriented; but once you get your hands on the Gravity Gun, there's a fair share of minor physics-based puzzles to keep things interesting (nothing majorly complex, but it's all good fun).

The story is pretty basic; Gordon Freeman wakes up after 10 years to find that the world has changed dramatically after the Black Mesa incident in the first game, and there's now an alien-human hybrid power known as the Combine ruling over everything. So our silent but deadly physicist sets out to be a thorn in the baddies' side. What HL2 does have, which the original Half Life didn't, is set up a cast of more memorable characters - from the likeable Alyx to the bumbling Kleiner to the imperious Dr. Breen. This helps it to stand out from its predecessor.

And finally, if the above hasn't sold you on the merits of Half Life 2, then I present the game's truly most memorable, winning element, the magic formula you need to bring chaos upon the Combine oppressors:

Step 1: acquire Gravity Gun.
Step 2: find urinal.
Step 3: launch urinal at enemy.
Step 4: profit.
It is a really fun classic Valve game!

Half-Life 2 conta a história de Gordon Freeman vinte anos depois do incidente com o Black Mesa. Para quem não sabe, Black Mesa foi um evento desencadeado por diversos cientistas em um “projeto” que deu errado e acabou por provocar uma invasão em massa de milhares de alienígenas. No final do primeiro jogo, Gordon é colocado em um estado de sono, em êxtase, no que acreditam ser uma espécie de universo paralelo, sem envelhecer e sem acordar durante vinte anos, que é quando começa a nossa história.

Half life 2, uno de los mejores videojuegos que jugado en mi vida, con una gran historia personajes inolvidables y una jugabilidad muy cómoda, la mayoría de las cosas nuevas que implementa half life 2 son increíbles, la nueva variedad en armas que nos presentan es muy buena y por supuesto para que no olvidemos que estamos en un half life nos presentan a la icónica palanca. La inteligencia artificial es hace sentir acompañado y o en peligro al personaje dependiendo la situación, no son personajes desarrollados profundamente con una trama súper, pero demuestran camaradería y te dejan ver que vos no estás solo en ese lugar, uno casi que se puede llegar a encariñar con Alyx. Gráficamente se mantiene excelente a pesar de los años que transcurrieron es un juego que se ve bastante bien para esta época, no es gráficamente uno de los mejores pero se sabe defender y yo creo que con algún mod de internet se convierte en algo de otro mundo, volviendo con los personajes, algo malo que tengo para decir sería qué hay retro continuidad, es una pena porque habían personajes qué se podrían haber agregado a esta entrega sin que haya retro continuidad, pero lo decidieron así y no me parece algo tan grave, lo que sí me parece una joyita que sigan manteniendo alo de misterio que atrae gman al juego. Cómo hable de los aliados que nos acompañan dentro de la aventura, también hay nuevos antagonistas, no sólo el principal sino que también hay una gran variedad de enemigos y eso da un aire fresco la nueva entrega de half life 2. Si tuviese que hablar sobre la música, realmente no puedo decir nada destacable de ella, me parece que está bien pero no es música que me pondría a escuchar fuera del juego. Es algo que solamente da relleno y acompaña en los momentos. Algo que me molestó siempre de half-life 2 son las pantallas de carga, en su época con una computadora normal tenías que esperar o más o menos cinco minutos para poder seguir jugando. Realmente detenían el ritmo de juego, es un poco comprensible porque al ser tantos mapas y para la época se entiende de que sean tan largas y tantas, pero es un mal del que no se pudieron librar. Cuando estamos por acabar el juego y nos enfrentamos al antagonista principal, realmente no nos sentimos en una gran batalla donde tenemos que demostrar todo lo que estuvimos aprendiendo hasta el momento y sacar a flote todas nuestras habilidades, es más como si fuera un puente para mostrarnos que esto no termina acá. Al final a pesar de sus errores, half-life 2 se mantienen como un excelente videojuego qué resiste de manera admirable al paso del tiempo. Es una obra Imprescindible para cualquier aficionado a los videojuegos que saben poner su historia como motivante sin por ello perder la chispa de los elementos clásicos del género. Siempre recomendable.
